key_risks: Economic sensitivity to regional downturns and interest rate fluctuations
Intense competition from traditional banks and fintech companies
controversies: Legal dispute: Kristopher James Company v. National Bank Holdings Corp.
Customer complaints related to bank accounts and fees
governance_issues: Regulatory oversight by federal and state bodies
